data.name: The Triumphant Return of Diabolos
data.detailed_description:
During the rise of the Demon Lord, humanity put aside its differences and came together to save the world. After the war, humans began persecuting all demons, even those who didn’t align themselves with the Demon Lord. They were effectively forced to go into hiding.

18 years later, a young man named Rein trained alongside his childhood friend, Ciel. They aimed to become imperial knights for their homeland, the aggressively expansionist Cedis Empire.

After venturing into a cave, a mysterious figure spirits Rein away and tells him, “We have been looking for you, Demon Lord Diabolos.”

Enjoy a complex turn-based combat system with Active Time Battle (ATB). Once your ATB bar is ready, make your choices carefully. Spells are powerful, but require longer casting times, while skills can be unleashed immediately. Also, be wary of the enemy's affinities! Every one of them has elemental weaknesses and resistances that you can use to your advantage.

Journey around the world to secure your newfound position! Grow strong enough to face the challenges ahead! Meet colorful characters and convince them to join your ranks to form a powerful party capable of taking on any foe!

Invest points in each party member's unique skill trees to unlock powerful moves and stat increases. Customize your fighters in any way you want! A nimble archer, an unmovable tank, a powerful mage… There are loads of possibilities! Buy and craft dozens of weapons, armor, and accessories to change the element of your attacks and directly influence your stats. Mix and match your gear strategically to gain an edge in every area.

A Complex Battle System

Using a party of four characters, take advantage of dozens of skills to exploit enemy weaknesses and assure victory. The ATB bar charges faster for nimble characters, which makes it perfect to paralyze slower swordsmen and mages before they can attack.

An Entire World to Explore

Sometimes, the long way around is the only path you can take. Embark on a journey that will take you around the world, see various locales, and meet many friends and foes alike.

Sprawling Skill Trees

Each character has multiple skill trees unique to them, which allows you to focus on any build you wish to try. Would she better serve you as a fast thief who never gets hit? Or maybe she'd be a better support mage that heals the rest of the party? Don't worry about your choices too much, though. Ample respec items will swiftly fix any mistake.

Gear Crafting System

You can buy gear from shops, sure, but why spend money when you can get better custom weapons and armor? Bring monster parts dropped by enemies after battles to a synthesis shop and let artisans meld them together to create powerful items... provided you've found the recipe beforehand!

data.short_description: Many years after humanity came together to defeat the Demon Lord, a young man trained to become an imperial knight. One day, however, he was confronted by a mysterious figure who said, "We have been looking for you, Demon Lord Diabolos."

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
